root: ^Penelope: Hey, where did your family go for summer vacation?
^Penelope: We went to the Maldives. It was OK but I wanted to go to the Seychelles. Daddy never gets me what I want!

c-0: ^Penelope: I know! Like last year, I asked for a pony and he gave me a horse. A horse!
c-1: ^Penelope: Excuse me? My daddy says I'm perfect so I deserve everything in the world.
^Penelope: I'm done talking to you now.
